articles.title: How Noah Schnapp Became Wingman For Doja Cat And Stranger Things's Joseph Quinn
articles.description: The 'Kiss Me More' rapper slid into the actor's DMs: 'Noah, can you tell Joseph to HMU?'
articles.content:
Stranger Things fans arent the only ones crushing on Joseph QuinnDoja Cat is, too! And she has apparently recruited Quinns co-star Noah Schnapp as her wingman.
It all started on May 30, three days a… [+1800 chars]
